```fixture
.aClass
  ctr({
    width: 200px
    height: 200px
  })

#aId
  ctr({
    width: 200px
    height: 200px
    background: red
  })
  span
    ctr({
      width: 200px
      font-size: 1em
    })
```

```fixture
.aClass {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
}
#aId {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  background: #f00;
}
#aId span {
  width: 200px;
  font-size: 1em;
}
```
